title: Flaws's Ban appeal was toxic really sorry please uban D: - Perm on First offence  no warning
body:
I have been banned when playing a game of league of legends I did say some things like bad and dumb because I was mad at the moment! I am sorry for my actions and if I do get unbanned by someone feeling bad for me or understanding I will never swear again. Once again I am sorry for what I did and here are the messages that I sent in this game! Btw Butterbro277 is my name and I know I was mean in this game I am very sorry! keep in mind i am friends with vayne in real life but it is still wrong! 
Game 1
Butterbro277: omg
Butterbro277: omg im so sorry SORRY
Butterbro277: soRRy misclick
Butterbro277: OMG VAYNE
Butterbro277: YOUR SO BAD 
Butterbro277: VI GANK PLS
Butterbro277: IMA EAT THASS JG
Butterbro277: VI
Butterbro277: I SWEAR
Butterbro277: I WILL EAST DA JGLER
Butterbro277: PLAY SAFE TEEMO
Butterbro277: jarvan the 4th more like 3rd
Butterbro277: so jarvan the 3rd why didnt you get a quadra
Butterbro277: if you have 4 in you name
Butterbro277: yo
Butterbro277: Shut up your not nice
Butterbro277: cumming
Butterbro277: omg katerina inting
Butterbro277: reported
Butterbro277: report katerina for inting
Butterbro277: hello are you alive
Butterbro277: just kdding your inting so your dead
Butterbro277: yo btw if your so dumb you didnt know who im talking to im talking to the dumb kid on your team - Katerina
Butterbro277: enemy quad? kill
Butterbro277: GG WP

replies.body:
> Perm on First offence no warning

This isn't true. You had a 14-day ban not long ago, where you were warned that the next offense would result in a permanent ban.

> Game 1

Also, why did you edit your chat logs (that's not rhetorical)? Here are the real logs:

[2:05] Butterbro277 (Morgana): omg
[2:34] Butterbro277 (Morgana): omg im so sorryt
[6:23] Butterbro277 (Morgana): soprryy missclick
[9:48] Butterbro277 (Morgana): OMG VAYNE
[9:51] Butterbro277 (Morgana): YOUR SO ASS
[11:46] Butterbro277 (Morgana): VI
[11:50] Butterbro277 (Morgana): IMA EAT THASST POOSUSSY
[11:52] Butterbro277 (Morgana): VI
[11:58] Butterbro277 (Morgana): I SWEAR
[12:02] Butterbro277 (Morgana): I WILL EAST DA PUSSY
[23:33] Butterbro277 (Morgana): PLAY SAFE TEEMO
[25:18] Butterbro277 (Morgana): jarvan the %%%
[25:36] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): so jarvan the %%% why didnt you get a quadra
[25:42] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): if you have 4 in you name
[25:47] Butterbro277 (Morgana): yo
[25:50] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): stfu your gay
[26:05] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): cumming
[28:06] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): omg katerina inting
[28:13] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): reported
[28:24] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): report katerina for inting
[28:37] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): hello are you alive
[28:44] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): just kdding your inting so your dead
[29:18] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): yo btw if your so retarted you didnt know who im talking to im talking to the %%% on your team - Katerina
[30:06] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): enemy %%% kill
[31:47] [All] Butterbro277 (Morgana): gg wp and sai i if noit %%%
Will you please remove "make love" from the in game chat filter?
Just tested it in game, it's not filtered.

While you are responding to filter questions can you explain to me why "fik" and "d. 10" is picked up by the filter? The first word is Danish for "got" and the second is how we write dates, in this case "the 10th".

I understand there is going to be some random things picked up from other languages but I have a hard time seeing where this comes from.

but what if you had chat filter off?


######kappa
That's what I told him but he's one of THOSE people.

Thanks Riot!

I hadn't checked today yet.
wait, "make love" is in the chat filter list?
Unless Tantram removes it for me. <3
{{summoner:11}}
Tantram to the rescue.
LMAO THIS MAN JUST GOT ROASTED BY RIOT EMPLOYEE!! Exposed for lying!
Tantram laying down the law. Also those chat logs are grade A stuff XD
Thank you Tantram.
That moment when you get rekt by the truth.
Lol
no way you get unbanned.
ye im just trying because im really sad and i want to play my favorite game that i spent over 100 dollars irl on D:

> [{quoted}](name=Butterbro277,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GOomdVJ1,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-07-19T16:41:10.783+0000)
>
> ye im just trying because im really sad and i want to play my favorite game that i spent over 100 dollars irl on D:

A permanent ban means this is at least the 4th time you get punished. If you intended to change your behavior, you would have done so by now.
i swear i was only banned this time
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

> [{quoted}](name=Butterbro277,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GOomdVJ1,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-19T17:25:21.626+0000)
>
> i swear i was only banned this time

So now that we know that was a lie and now that Tantram has published your full chat log, do you want to try another excuse? 

If you have to lie about what happens, then you know exactly why you deserve the punishment; it's for the part you didn't include in your story.

> [{quoted}](name=AraMoOse,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GOomdVJ1,comment-id=00000000000000000001,timestamp=2017-07-20T00:41:14.313+0000)
>
> So now that we know that was a lie and now that Tantram has published your full chat log, do you want to try another excuse? 
> 
> If you have to lie about what happens, then you know exactly why you deserve the punishment; it's for the part you didn't include in your story.

Wait let me guess (assuming the OP comes back) Im going to assume it was his friend using his account, or maybe his brother? Wait no even better his Dog got a hold on his account and playing/typing!

> [{quoted}](name=Sarutobi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GOomdVJ1,comment-id=000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-07-20T11:57:24.382+0000)
>
> Wait let me guess (assuming the OP comes back) Im going to assume it was his friend using his account, or maybe his brother? Wait no even better his Dog got a hold on his account and playing/typing!

If it had been his dog, the chat would say nothing but "woof woof" "arf arf" all the time.

> [{quoted}](name=Sarutobi,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=GOomdVJ1,comment-id=000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-07-20T11:57:24.382+0000)
>
> Wait let me guess (assuming the OP comes back) Im going to assume it was his friend using his account, or maybe his brother? Wait no even better his Dog got a hold on his account and playing/typing!

If shows like Dog with a Blog and Fairly OddParents (the latter with the talking Fairy Dog named Sparky) are anything to go by anything is possible after all ;).
Tantram is not impressed by your lies.

Are you certain you have never received a ~~precious~~ (too amusing a typo to just correct) previous punishment, and that this is your ENTIRE chat log? Being permanently banned immediately for just one game is exceptionally uncommon save in instances of the absolute worst behavior.
Precioussss where is my precioussss WHERE IS MY RING! BAGINSSSS!
You know Riot can see the full chat log AND your previous punishments...right?

If you're being legit then I'm sorry this happened to you.

I'll upvote this to get visibility and hopefully bring Riot Tantram in.

Just know that if you're lying then you're the worst sort of trash for trying to manipulate us.

Riot Tantram will sort this out and either help you (if truth) or call you on your bullshit (if lying).
You don't deserve it.
You don't get banned on your first offense unless it's absurdly offensive. This has hate speech and probably got you a suspension.
Seriously, what are you on to behave like this and expect to get unbanned?
+1 I think everyone deserves another chance if you are being serious on changing your ways and how to deal with your anger you should be unbanned

I have to say, while you shouldn't have said what you did, that is NOWERE near enough for a permaban. It doesn't even flow together and there feels like there is SO MUCH missing. Not being honest with us won't get you anywhere. 

edit: Tantram to the rescue, didn't notice.
Damn dude you really feel like a 13 years old spoiling child. I hope you're not like 17-20, otherwise I would doubt your IQ.
Any other games in the chat logs? Seems a little light.
